meanings.sent1: The magician's illusionary tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The painting created an illusionary effect of depth.
meanings.sent3: The illusionary appearance of the disappearing act left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an illusionary veil hiding her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The illusionary mirage in the desert deceived the weary travelers.

meanings.definition: Of the nature of an illusion
meanings.sent1: The dream had an illusionary quality that made it seem real.
meanings.sent2: The fog created an illusionary landscape in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The illusionary sound of laughter echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent4: His promises were as illusionary as a rainbow after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The illusionary reflection in the mirror distorted her features.

meanings.sent1: The advertisement made illusionary claims about the product's benefits.
meanings.sent2: The mirage in the desert was an illusionary oasis.
meanings.sent3: The illusionary promise of easy money led to disappointment.
meanings.sent4: His illusionary charm masked his true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The illusionary appearance of the old house hid its true beauty.
